report.message: org.xml.sax.SAXParseException: Element type "eissn" must be declared.
org.xml.sax.SAXParseException: The content of element type "journal-meta" must match "(journal-id+,journal-title-group*,issn+,isbn*,publisher?,notes?)".
Article publisher id (scibx.2008.1091) does not match XML filename: file:/C:/work/npg-xml/trunk/distro/test-candidate.xml.
